attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LxB6nzbVG-8Log6I6TQ_description
attribs.current: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit. range 30/120 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LxB6nzbVG-8Log6I6TR_desc
attribs.current: The drow scourge has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow scourge to sleep.

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LxB6nzbVG-8Log6I6TS_desc
attribs.current:
The drow scourge's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spell, requiring no material components:
At will: dancing lights 1/day each: darkness, faerie fire

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LxB6nzbVG-8Log6I6TT_desc
attribs.current: While in sunlight, the drow scourge has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LxB6oZHjNQ9yzJHF22w_spelldescription
attribs.current: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air for the duration. You can also combine the four lights into one glowing vaguely humanoid form of Medium size. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius. As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a new spot within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light winks out if it exceeds the spell’s range.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LxB6oZHjNQ9yzJHF22w_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A bit of phosphorus or wychwood, or a glowworm

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LxB6oZISyTkpYtDlhZx_spelldescription
attribs.current: Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range to fill a 15-foot-radius sphere for the duration. The darkness spreads around corners. A creature with darkvision can’t see through this darkness, and nonmagical light can’t illuminate it. If the point you choose is on an object you are holding or one that isn’t being worn or carried, the darkness emanates from the object and moves with it. Completely covering the source of the darkness with an opaque object, such as a bowl or a helm, blocks the darkness. If any of this spell’s area overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LxB6oZISyTkpYtDlhZx_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: Bat fur and a drop of pitch or piece of coal

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LxB6oZISyTkpYtDlhZx_spelltarget
attribs.current: A point you choose within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LxB6oZISyTkpYtDlhZy_spelldescription
attribs.current: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Any creature in the area when the spell is cast is also outlined in light if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed dim light in a 10-foot radius. Any attack roll against an affected creature or object has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature or object can’t benefit from being invisible.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LxB6oZISyTkpYtDlhZy_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range

attribs.name: repeating_npctrait_-LxB8WCVlZTVYK2JnnK0_desc
attribs.current: Once per turn, the drow scourge can deal an extra 10 (3d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the drow scourge that isn't incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LxB8nlXh9Yq0B36nC7z_description
attribs.current: The drow makes two attacks with its scimitar.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LxB6nzarAyEQqJyBPer_description
attribs.current:
Description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (ld6 + 5) slashing damage, plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

attribs.name: repeating_npcreaction_-LxB9j2Gcvl7S02tJsvk_desc
attribs.current: If an enemy makes a melee attack against the drow and misses, the drow may attempt a single counter-attack. To do so, the drow must see the attacker and be wielding a weapon.
